name: Thoughtform Motion System
description: Timing, easing, and animation tokens. Instrument-like precision meets organic warmth.

timing.note: Use 'deliberate' for most UI. 'quick' for micro-interactions. 'dramatic' for page transitions.

easing.note-instrument: Expo ease-out. Snappy start, gentle settle. Like a brass instrument needle.
easing.note-glitch: Back ease-in-out. Overshoot for displacement effects.
easing.note-linear: For continuous animations like particle flow.

1.name: texture
1.description: Background noise, subtle grain. Ambient atmosphere.

2.name: scanlines
2.description: Horizontal line overlay. Processing, loading states.

3.name: displacement
3.description: Pixel offset, brief stutter. Transitions, state changes.

4.name: aberration
4.description: RGB split, chromatic shift. Errors, warnings, dramatic moments.

glitch.note: Glitch intensity scale. Level 0-1 for content, 2 for loading, 3 for transitions, 4 for errors/drama.

trail.note: Trail alpha for clearWithTrail(). Lower = longer trails.

breathe.note: Sine wave speed for breathing/pulsing animations.

stagger.note: Delay between sequential element animations (e.g., list items appearing).

cssVariables.note: Copy-paste ready CSS variables for motion tokens.
